addPool(address,uint24).details: Add a new pool to the registry.

params.baseToken: The token that the pool is for.
params.feeRatio: The fee ratio for the pool.

candidate().details: Returns the candidate that can become the owner.

getFeeRatio(address).details: The ratio is in `1e6` format, that means `1% = 1e4`

params.baseToken: The address of the base token

returns._0: The fee ratio of the market, it is a decimal in `1e6`

getInsuranceFundFeeRatio(address).details: The ratio is in `1e6` format, that means `1% = 1e4`

params.baseToken: The address of the base token

returns._0: The fee ratio of the market, it is a decimal in `1e6`

params.baseToken: The address of the base token

returns._0: The max allowed orders per market

params.baseToken: The address of the base token

returns._0: The address of the quote token
The address of the Uniswap factory
True if the pool exist, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFeeRatio(address,uint24).details: Set the fee ratio for a pool

params.baseToken: The token address of the pool.
params.feeRatio: The fee ratio for the pool.

setInsuranceFundFeeRatio(address,uint24).details: Set insurance fund fee ratio for a pool

params.baseToken: The token address of the pool.
params.insuranceFundFeeRatioArg: The fee ratio for the pool.

setMaxOrdersPerMarket(uint8).details: Set max allowed orders per market

params.maxOrdersPerMarketArg: The max allowed orders per market

setOwner(address).details: Set ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateOwner().details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`_candidate`). Can only be called by the new owner.

FeeRatioChanged(address,uint24).notice: Emitted when the fee ratio of a market is updated.

InsuranceFundFeeRatioChanged(address,uin.notice: Emitted when the insurance fund fee ratio is updated.

MaxOrdersPerMarketChanged(uint8).notice: Emitted when the max orders per market is updated.

PoolAdded(address,uint24,address).notice: Emitted when a new market is created.

getFeeRatio(address).notice: Get the fee ratio of a given market

getInsuranceFundFeeRatio(address).notice: Get the insurance fund fee ratio of a given market

getMarketInfo(address).notice: Get the market info by given base token address

getMaxOrdersPerMarket().notice: Get max allowed orders per market

getPool(address).notice: Get the pool address (UNIv3 pool) by given base token address

hasPool(address).notice: Check if a pool exist by given base token address
